wikipedia_page.main:
James Albery (born 2 October 1995) is an English international field hockey player who plays as a defender for England and Great Britain.He plays club hockey in the Men's England Hockey League Premier Division for Old Georgians. 
Albery has also played for Cambridge City and Beeston.
He attended The Leys School, Cambridge. In Upper Sixth he was Head Boy.

response: * James Albery (2009-2014): Field Hockey player for England Hockey, Cambridge City Hockey Club, and Beeston Hockey Club
